languages.text: {n}Впервые Ирлиэт делает глубокий вдох через нос — и едва слышно выдыхает. Тело ее все так же расслаблено, глаза — закрыты. Не похоже, что ваше присутствие хоть как-то ее увлекает.{/n}

{n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Впервые Ирлиэт делает глубокий вдох через нос — и едва слышно выдыхает. Тело ее все так же расслаблено, глаза — закрыты. Не похоже, что ваше присутствие хоть как-то ее увлекает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Por primera vez, Yrliet inspira profundamente a través de la nariz, y luego exhala casi sin hacer ruido. Su cuerpo está tan relajado como siempre, y sus ojos continúan cerrados. Tu presencia no parece distraerla de ningún modo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por primera vez, Yrliet inspira profundamente a través de la nariz, y luego exhala casi sin hacer ruido. Su cuerpo está tan relajado como siempre, y sus ojos continúan cerrados. Tu presencia no parece distraerla de ningún modo.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは初めて鼻で深呼吸をし、ほとんど聞こえないように息を吐く。彼女の身体は以前にも増してリラックスしており、目は閉じたままだ。こちらの存在にまったく動じていないらしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは初めて鼻で深呼吸をし、ほとんど聞こえないように息を吐く。彼女の身体は以前にも増してリラックスしており、目は閉じたままだ。こちらの存在にまったく動じていないらしい。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}这是你第一次看到伊莉耶特用鼻子深深地吸了一口气，但随后，你几乎没听见她呼出气的声音。她的身体仍像之前一样放松，双眼紧闭着。你的存在似乎没让她分心丝毫。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这是你第一次看到伊莉耶特用鼻子深深地吸了一口气，但随后，你几乎没听见她呼出气的声音。她的身体仍像之前一样放松，双眼紧闭着。你的存在似乎没让她分心丝毫。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet inspire profondément par le nez pour la première fois, puis expire presque silencieusement. Son corps est toujours aussi détendu et ses paupières restent closes. Votre présence ne semble la distraire en aucune manière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet inspire profondément par le nez pour la première fois, puis expire presque silencieusement. Son corps est toujours aussi détendu et ses paupières restent closes. Votre présence ne semble la distraire en aucune manière.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Zum ersten Mal atmet Yrliet tief durch die Nase ein — und dann kaum hörbar wieder aus. Ihr Körper bleibt so entspannt wie eh und je, und ihre Augen sind noch immer geschlossen. Deine Anwesenheit scheint sie nicht im Geringsten abzulenken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zum ersten Mal atmet Yrliet tief durch die Nase ein — und dann kaum hörbar wieder aus. Ihr Körper bleibt so entspannt wie eh und je, und ihre Augen sind noch immer geschlossen. Deine Anwesenheit scheint sie nicht im Geringsten abzulenken.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, bedeninin bu şekle bürünmesinden beri ilk defa burnundan derince soluyor. Nefesini verdiğiyse neredeyse duyulmuyor. Vücuduna rahatlık hâkim, gözleriyse hâlâ sıkı sıkıya kapalı. Görünüşe göre varlığın hiçbir şekilde dikkatini dağıtmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, Yrliet takes a deep breath in through her nose — and barely audibly exhales. Her body remains as relaxed as ever, and her eyes are still closed. Your presence does not seem to be in any way distracting for her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, bedeninin bu şekle bürünmesinden beri ilk defa burnundan derin bir nefes alıyor. Nefesini verdiğiyse neredeyse duyulmuyor. Bedenine rahatlık hâkim, gözleriyse hâlâ sıkı sıkıya kapalı. Görünüşe göre varlığın hiçbir şekilde dikkatini dağıtmıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
